column1: #text=Yesterday was my sisters birthday so I decided to bake a cake for her .
#text=I looked up the recipe for a chocolate cake in my cooking book .
#text=Chocolate cake is my sisters favorite kind of cake .
#text=I looked at the list of ingredients and checked my cupboards to make sure I had them all .
#text=I preheated the oven as instructed by the recipe .
#text=I weighed the ingredients with the weighing scales .
#text=I cracked two eggs into the mixing bowl .
#text=I then poured the rest of the ingredients into the bowl .
#text=I mixed the ingredients for 5 minutes with an electric mixer .
#text=I poured the mixed ingredients into a cake tin and placed it in the oven .
#text=After 20 minutes the cake was finished and I removed it from the oven .
#text=I let it cool down for a few minutes while I made some icing .
#text=I poured the icing over the cooled down cake and decorated the cake with some edible glitter .
